   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: ct_error_SUITE
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description: 
   25: %%% Test various errors in Common Test suites.
   26: %%%
   27: %%% The suites used for the test are located in the data directory.
   28: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -module(ct_hooks_SUITE).
   30: 
   31: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   32: 
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   35: -include_lib("kernel/src/logger_internal.hrl").
   36: 
   37: -define(eh, ct_test_support_eh).
   38: 
   39: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   40: %% TEST SERVER CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   41: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   42: 
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: %% Description: Since Common Test starts another Test Server
   45: %% instance, the tests need to be performed on a separate node (or
   46: %% there will be clashes with logging processes etc).
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   49:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
   50:     TestDir = filename:join(DataDir,"cth/tests/"),
   51:     CTHs = filelib:wildcard(filename:join(TestDir,"*_cth.erl")),
   52:     io:format("CTHs: ~p",[CTHs]),
   53:     [io:format("Compiling ~p: ~p",
   54: 	    [FileName,compile:file(FileName,[{outdir,TestDir},debug_info])]) ||
   55: 	FileName <- CTHs],
   56:     ct_test_support:init_per_suite([{path_dirs,[TestDir]} | Config]).
   57: 
   58: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   59:     ct_test_support:end_per_suite(Config).
   60: 
   61: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   62:     ct_test_support:init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   63: 
   64: 
   65: end_per_testcase(cth_log_formatter = TestCase, Config) ->
   66:     ct_test_support:ct_rpc(
   67:       {logger,set_handler_config,
   68:        [default, formatter,
   69:         {?DEFAULT_FORMATTER,?DEFAULT_FORMAT_CONFIG}]}, Config),
   70:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config);
   71: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   72:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   73: 
   74: 
   75: suite() ->
   76:     [{timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   77: 
   78: all() ->
   79:     all(suite).
   80: 
   81: all(suite) ->
   82:     lists:reverse(
   83:       [
   84:        crash_groups, crash_all, bad_return_groups, bad_return_all,
   85:        illegal_values_groups, illegal_values_all, alter_groups, alter_all,
   86:        alter_all_to_skip, alter_all_from_skip,
   87:        one_cth, two_cth, faulty_cth_no_init, faulty_cth_id_no_init,
   88:        faulty_cth_exit_in_init, faulty_cth_exit_in_id,
   89:        faulty_cth_exit_in_init_scope_suite, minimal_cth,
   90:        minimal_and_maximal_cth, faulty_cth_undef,
   91:        scope_per_suite_cth, scope_per_group_cth, scope_suite_cth,
   92:        scope_suite_group_only_cth,
   93:        scope_per_suite_state_cth, scope_per_group_state_cth,
   94:        scope_suite_state_cth,
   95:        fail_pre_suite_cth, double_fail_pre_suite_cth,
   96:        fail_post_suite_cth, skip_pre_suite_cth, skip_pre_end_cth,
   97:        skip_pre_init_tc_cth, fail_post_init_tc_cth,
   98:        skip_post_suite_cth, recover_post_suite_cth, update_config_cth, update_config_cth2,
   99:        state_update_cth, update_result_cth, options_cth, same_id_cth,
  100:        fail_n_skip_with_minimal_cth, prio_cth, no_config,
  101:        no_init_suite_config, no_init_config, no_end_config,
  102:        failed_sequence, repeat_force_stop, config_clash,
  103:        callbacks_on_skip, fallback, data_dir,
  104:        cth_log, cth_log_formatter, cth_log_unexpect
  105:       ]
  106:     ).
  107: 
  108: 
  109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  110: %% TEST CASES
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: 
  113: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  114: %%% 
  115: one_cth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  116:     do_test(one_empty_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[empty_cth], Config).
  117: 
  118: two_cth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  119:     do_test(two_empty_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[empty_cth,empty_cth],
  120: 	    Config).
  121: 
  122: faulty_cth_no_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     do_test(faulty_cth_no_init, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[askjhdkljashdkaj],
  124: 	    Config,{error,"Failed to start CTH, see the "
  125: 		   "CT Log for details"}).
  126: 
  127: faulty_cth_id_no_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  128:     do_test(faulty_cth_id_no_init, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[id_no_init_cth],
  129: 	    Config,{error,"Failed to start CTH, see the "
  130: 		   "CT Log for details"}).
  131:

  133:     do_test(minimal_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[minimal_cth],Config).

  138:

  159:

  276: 
  277: cth_log(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  278:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  279:     %% html I/O log
  280:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  281:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log, "cth_log_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  282:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  283:     TCLogs =
  284: 	filelib:wildcard(
  285: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  286: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/cth_log_suite.tc*.html")),
  287:     lists:foreach(
  288:       fun(TCLog) ->
  289: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(TCLog),
  290: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  291: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("=ERROR"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  292: 					    {E+1,I,N,L};
  293: 				       ("=INFO"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  294: 					    {E,I+1,N,L};
  295: 				       ("=NOTICE"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  296: 					    {E,I,N+1,L};
  297: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  298: 					    {E,I,N,L+1};
  299: 				       (_, N) -> N
  300: 				    end, {0,0,0,0}, Ts),
  301: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Info,Notice,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  302:                      [Matches,TCLog]),
  303:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  304:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<1] of
  305:                   [] -> ok;
  306:                   _ -> exit({missing_io,TCLog})
  307: 	      end
  308:       end, TCLogs),
  309:     ok.
  310: 
  311: cth_log_formatter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  312:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  313:     %% html I/O log using the formatter
  314:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  315:     ct_test_support:ct_rpc({logger,set_handler_config,[default, formatter,
  316:                               {logger_formatter,#{ template => [level,":",msg,"\n"] }}]},
  317:                            Config),
  318:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log_formatter, "cth_log_formatter_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  319:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  320:     TCLogs =
  321: 	filelib:wildcard(
  322: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  323: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/cth_log_formatter_suite.tc*.html")),
  324:     lists:foreach(
  325:       fun(TCLog) ->
  326: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(TCLog),
  327: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  328: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("error:"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  329: 					    {E+1,N,L};
  330: 				       ("notice:"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  331: 					    {E,N+1,L};
  332: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  333: 					    {E,N,L+1};
  334: 				       (_, N) -> N
  335: 				    end, {0,0,0}, Ts),
  336: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Notice,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  337:                      [Matches,TCLog]),
  338:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  339:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<1] of
  340:                   [] -> ok;
  341:                   _ -> exit({missing_io,TCLog})
  342: 	      end
  343:       end, TCLogs),
  344:     ok.
  345: 
  346: cth_log_unexpect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  347:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  348:     %% unexpected I/O log
  349:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  350:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log_unexpect, "cth_log_unexpect_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  351:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  352:     UnexpIoLogs =
  353: 	filelib:wildcard(
  354: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  355: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/unexpected_io.log.html")),
  356:     lists:foreach(
  357:       fun(UnexpIoLog) ->
  358: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(UnexpIoLog),
  359: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  360: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("=ERROR"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  361: 					    {E+1,I,L};
  362: 				       ("=INFO"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  363: 					    {E,I+1,L};
  364: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  365: 					    {E,I,L+1};
  366: 				       (_, N) -> N
  367: 				    end, {0,0,0}, Ts),
  368: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Info,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  369:                      [Matches,UnexpIoLog]),
  370:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  371:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<3] of
  372:                   [] -> ok;
  373:                   _ -> exit({missing_unexpected_io,UnexpIoLog})
  374: 	      end
  375:       end, UnexpIoLogs),
  376:     ok.
  377: 
  378: %% OTP-10599 adds the Suite argument as first argument to all hook
  379: %% callbacks that did not have a Suite argument from before. This test
  380: %% checks that ct_hooks will fall back to old versions of callbacks if
  381: %% new versions are not exported.
  382: fallback(Config) ->
  383:     do_test(fallback, "all_hook_callbacks_SUITE.erl",[fallback_cth], Config).
  384: 
  385: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  386: %% are skipped in different ways
  387: callbacks_on_skip(Config) ->
  388:     do_test(callbacks_on_skip, {spec,"skip.spec"},[skip_cth], Config).
  389: 
  390: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  391: %% are skipped due to failed sequence
  392: failed_sequence(Config) ->
  393:     do_test(failed_sequence, "seq_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config).
  394: 
  395: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  396: %% are skipped due to {force_stop,skip_rest} option
  397: repeat_force_stop(Config) ->
  398:     do_test(repeat_force_stop, "repeat_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config, ok, 2,
  399:             [{force_stop,skip_rest},{duration,"000009"}]).
  400: 
  401: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when a test
  402: %% fails due to clash in config alias names
  403: config_clash(Config) ->
  404:     do_test(config_clash, "config_clash_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config).
  405: 
  406: %% Test post_groups and post_all hook callbacks, introduced by OTP-14746
  407: alter_groups(Config) ->
  408:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  409:                          [{post_groups_return,[{new_group,[tc1,tc2]}]},
  410:                           {post_all_return,[{group,new_group}]}],Config),
  411:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  412:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  413: 
  414: alter_all(Config) ->
  415:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,[tc2]}],Config),
  416:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  417:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  418: 
  419: alter_all_from_skip(Config) ->
  420:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{all_return,{skip,"skipped by all/0"}},
  421:                                          {post_all_return,[tc2]}],Config),
  422:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  423:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  424: 
  425: alter_all_to_skip(Config) ->
  426:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  427:                          [{post_all_return,{skip,"skipped by post_all/3"}}],
  428:                          Config),
  429:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  430:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  431: 
  432: bad_return_groups(Config) ->
  433:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_groups_return,not_a_list}],
  434:                          Config),
  435:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  436:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  437: 
  438: bad_return_all(Config) ->
  439:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,not_a_list}],
  440:                          Config),
  441:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  442:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  443: 
  444: illegal_values_groups(Config) ->
  445:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  446:                          [{post_groups_return,[{new_group,[this_test_does_not_exist]},
  447:                                           this_is_not_a_group_def]}],
  448:                          Config),
  449:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  450:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  451: 
  452: illegal_values_all(Config) ->
  453:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  454:                          [{post_all_return,[{group,this_group_does_not_exist},
  455:                                        {this_is_not_a_valid_term}]}],
  456:                          Config),
  457:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  458:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  459: 
  460: crash_groups(Config) ->
  461:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_groups_return,crash}],Config),
  462:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  463:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  464: 
  465: crash_all(Config) ->
  466:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,crash}],Config),
  467:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  468:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  469: 
  470: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  471: %%% HELP FUNCTIONS
  472: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  473: 
  474: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config) ->
  475:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, ok).
  476: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, {error,_} = Res) ->
  477:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res, 1,[]);
  478: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res) ->
  479:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res, 2,[]).
  480: 
  481: do_test(Tag, WhatToTest, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts) when is_list(WhatToTest) ->
  482:     do_test(Tag, {suite,WhatToTest}, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts);
  483: do_test(Tag, {WhatTag,Wildcard}, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts) ->
  484:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  485:     Files = filelib:wildcard(
  486:                filename:join([DataDir,"cth/tests",Wildcard])),
  487:     {Opts,ERPid} =
  488:         setup([{WhatTag,Files},{ct_hooks,CTHs},{label,Tag}|ExtraOpts], Config),
  489: 
  490:     Res = ct_test_support:run(Opts, Config),
  491:     Events = ct_test_support:get_events(ERPid, Config),
  492: 
  493:     ct_test_support:log_events(Tag,
  494: 			       reformat(Events, ?eh),
  495: 			       ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  496: 			       Opts),
  497: 
  498:     TestEvents = events_to_check(Tag, EC),
  499:     ok = ct_test_support:verify_events(TestEvents, Events, Config),
  500:     Opts.
  501: 
  502: setup(Test, Config) ->
  503:     Opts0 = ct_test_support:get_opts(Config),
  504:     Level = ?config(trace_level, Config),
  505:     EvHArgs = [{cbm,ct_test_support},{trace_level,Level}],
  506:     Opts = Opts0 ++ [{event_handler,{?eh,EvHArgs}}|Test],
  507:     ERPid = ct_test_support:start_event_receiver(Config),
  508:     {Opts,ERPid}.
  509: 
  510: reformat(Events, EH) ->
  511:     ct_test_support:reformat(Events, EH).
  512: %reformat(Events, _EH) ->
  513: %    Events.
  514: 
  515: gen_config(Name,KeyVals,Config) ->
  516:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  517:     File = filename:join(PrivDir,atom_to_list(Name)++".cfg"),
  518:     ok = file:write_file(File,[io_lib:format("~p.~n",[{Key,Value}])
  519:                                || {Key,Value} <- KeyVals]),
  520:     File.
  521: 
  522: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  523: %%% TEST EVENTS
  524: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  525: events_to_check(Test) ->
  526:     %% 2 tests (ct:run_test + script_start) is default
  527:     events_to_check(Test, 2).
  528: 
  529: events_to_check(_, 0) ->
  530:     [];
  531: events_to_check(Test, N) ->
  532:     test_events(Test) ++ events_to_check(Test, N-1).
  533: 
  534: test_events(one_empty_cth) ->
  535:     [
  536:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  537:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  538:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,id,[[]]}},
  539:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,init,[{'_','_','_'},[]]}},
  540:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes after init when hook
  541:      %% is installed with start flag/option.
  542:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_groups,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,[]]}},
  543:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_all,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,[test_case],[]]}},
  544:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
  545:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_suite,
  546: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  547:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_suite,
  548: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},
  549:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
  550:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case}},
  551:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  552:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  553:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  554:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  555:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  556: 
  557:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
  558:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_suite,
  559: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  560:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  561:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
  562:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  563:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,terminate,[[]]}},
  564:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
  565:     ];
  566:

  596:      {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[[]]}},

  754: test_events(scope_suite_cth) ->
  755:     [
  756:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  757:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  758:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes before init when hook
  759:      %% is installed in suite/0
  760:      %% And there should be no terminate after these, since init is
  761:      %% not yet called.
  762:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_groups,['_',[]]}},
  763:      {negative,
  764:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,['_']}},
  765:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_all,['_','_',[]]}}},
  766:      {negative,
  767:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,['_']}},
  768:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite}}},
  769:      {?eh,cth,{'_',id,[[]]}},
  770:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
  771:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  772:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},

  774: 
  775:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,test_case}},
  776:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},

  779: 
  780:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,end_per_suite}},

  782:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist','_',[]]}},

  789: test_events(scope_suite_group_only_cth) ->
  790:     Suite = ct_scope_suite_group_only_cth_SUITE,
  791:     CTH = empty_cth,
  792:     [
  793:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  794:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  795:      {?eh,start_info,{1,1,1}},
  796:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes before init when hook
  797:      %% is installed in suite/0
  798:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_groups,['_',['_']]}},
  799:      {negative,
  800:       {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_all,['_','_','_']}},
  801:       {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,init_per_suite}}},
  802:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,id,[[]]}},
  803:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,init,['_',[]]}},
  804:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,pre_init_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist',mystate]}},
  805:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_init_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist','$proplist',mystate]}},
  806:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,init_per_suite,ok}},
  807: 
  808:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,end_per_suite}},
  809:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,pre_end_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist',mystate]}},
  810:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_end_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist','_',mystate]}},
  811:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,terminate,[mystate]}},
  812:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,end_per_suite,ok}},
  813:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  814:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
  815:     ];
  816: 
  817: test_events(scope_per_group_cth) ->
  818:     [
  819:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  820:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  821:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
  822:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
  823: 
  824:      [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{init_per_group,group1,[]}}},
  825:       {?eh,cth,{'_',id,[[]]}},
  826:       {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
  827:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1, '$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},
  828:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{init_per_group,group1,[]},ok}},
  829: 
  830:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case}},
  831:       {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  832:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_testcase,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',ok,[]]}},
  833:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  834: 
  835:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{end_per_group,group1,[]}}},
  836:       {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1,'$proplist',[]]}},
  837:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  838:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[[]]}},
  839:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{end_per_group,group1,[]},ok}}],
  840: 
  841:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,end_per_suite}},

 1150:                    {{test_case_failed,"Failed in init_per_testcase"},'_'}}}},
 1151:                 []]}},
 1152:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,test_case,
 1153:                    {failed,"Changed skip to fail in post_init_per_testcase"}}},
 1154:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_fail,
 1155:                [ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,test_case,
 1156:                 "Changed skip to fail in post_init_per_testcase",
 1157:                 []]}},
 1158:      {?eh,test_stats,{0,1,{0,0}}},
 1159:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE,end_per_suite}},

 1202:         fun(Case, Result) ->

 1210:                                          pre_init_per_group,

 1212:                                          init_per_suite,
 1213:                                          pre_init_per_suite]),
 1214:                             []]}},

 1216:                            [Suite,
 1217:                             Case,contains(
 1218:                                         [init_per_testcase,
 1219:                                          pre_init_per_testcase,

 1226:                             ok,[]]}},

 1228:                            [Suite,
 1229:                             Case,contains(

 1256:         end,

 1258: test_events(update_config_cth2) ->
 1259:     Suite = ct_update_config_SUITE2,
 1260:     TestCaseEvents =
 1261:         fun(Case, Result) ->
 1262:                 {PreEndPerTestcaseHookEventAdd, PostEndPerTestcaseEventAdd} =
 1263:                     %% Case below is unexpected thing which needs clarification
 1264:                     %% test_case_timetrap should behave the same
 1265:                     case lists:member(Case, [test_case_timetrap]) of
 1266:                         true ->
 1267:                             {[], []};
 1268:                         _ ->
 1269:                             {
 1270:                              [{?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_testcase,
 1271:                                         [Suite,
 1272:                                          Case,contains(
 1273:                                                 [post_init_per_testcase,
 1274:                                                  %% init_per_testcase,
 1275:                                                  pre_init_per_testcase,
 1276:                                                  post_init_per_group,
 1277:                                                  init_per_group,
 1278:                                                  pre_init_per_group,
 1279:                                                  post_init_per_suite,
 1280:                                                  init_per_suite,
 1281:                                                  pre_init_per_suite]),
 1282:                                          []]}}], [pre_end_per_testcase]}
 1283:                     end,
 1284:                 [
 1285:                  {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,Case}},
 1286:                  {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_testcase,
 1287:                            [Suite,
 1288:                             Case,contains(
 1289:                                         [post_init_per_group,
 1290:                                          init_per_group,
 1291:                                          pre_init_per_group,
 1292:                                          post_init_per_suite,
 1293:                                          init_per_suite,
 1294:                                          pre_init_per_suite]),
 1295:                             []]}},
 1296:                  {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_testcase,
 1297:                            [Suite,
 1298:                             Case,contains(
 1299:                                         [
 1300:                                          %% init_per_testcase,
 1301:                                          pre_init_per_testcase,
 1302:                                          post_init_per_group,
 1303:                                          init_per_group,
 1304:                                          pre_init_per_group,
 1305:                                          post_init_per_suite,
 1306:                                          init_per_suite,
 1307:                                          pre_init_per_suite
 1308:                                         ]),
 1309:                             ok,[]]}}] ++
 1310:                     PreEndPerTestcaseHookEventAdd ++
 1311:                  [{?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_testcase,
 1312:                            [Suite,
 1313:                             Case,contains(PostEndPerTestcaseEventAdd ++
 1314:                                         [post_init_per_testcase,
 1315:                                          %% init_per_testcase,
 1316:                                          pre_init_per_testcase,
 1317:                                          post_init_per_group,
 1318:                                          init_per_group,
 1319:                                          pre_init_per_group,
 1320:                                          post_init_per_suite,
 1321:                                          init_per_suite,
 1322:                                          pre_init_per_suite]),
 1323:                             Result,[]]}},
 1324:                  {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,Case,ok}}
 1325:                 ]
 1326:         end,
 1327:     update_config_cth_test_events(TestCaseEvents, Suite);

 1534: test_events(fail_n_skip_with_minimal_cth) ->
 1535:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 1536:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 1537:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
 1538:      {?eh,tc_start,{'_',init_per_suite}},
 1539: 
 1540:      {parallel,
 1541:       [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1542: 						      group1,[parallel]}}},
 1543:        {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1544: 						     group1,[parallel]},ok}},
 1545:        {parallel,
 1546: 	[{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1547: 							group2,[parallel]}}},
 1548: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1549: 						       group2,[parallel]},ok}},
 1550: 	 %% Verify that 'skip' as well as 'skipped' works
 1551: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case2}},
 1552: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case2,{skipped,"skip it"}}},
 1553: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case3}},
 1554: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case3,{skipped,"skip it"}}},
 1555: 	 {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,[ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,
 1556:                                          {test_case2,group2},
 1557: 					 {tc_user_skip,"skip it"},
 1558: 					 []]}},
 1559: 	 {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,[ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,
 1560:                                          {test_case3,group2},
 1561: 					 {tc_user_skip,"skip it"},
 1562: 					 []]}},
 1563: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1564: 							group2,[parallel]}}},
 1565: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,group2,
 1566: 						       [parallel]},ok}}]},
 1567:        {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1568: 						      group1,[parallel]}}},
 1569:        {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1570: 						     group1,[parallel]},ok}}]},
 1571: 
 1572:      {?eh,tc_done,{'_',end_per_suite,ok}},
 1573:      {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[[]]}},
 1574:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1575:     ];
 1576: 
 1577: test_events(prio_cth) ->
 1578:     GenPre = fun(Func,States) when Func==pre_init_per_suite;
 1579:                                    Func==pre_end_per_suite ->
 1580: 		     [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_',State]}} ||
 1581:                          State <- States];
 1582:                 (Func,States) ->
 1583: 		     [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1584: 			 State <- States]
 1585: 	     end,
 1586: 
 1587:     GenPost = fun(Func,States) when Func==post_init_per_suite;
 1588:                                     Func==post_end_per_suite ->
 1589: 		      [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1590: 			  State <- States];
 1591:                  (Func,States) ->
 1592: 		      [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1593: 			  State <- States]
 1594: 
 1595:               end,
 1596: 
 1597:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 1598:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}}] ++
 1599: 
 1600: 	[{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,init_per_suite}}] ++
 1601: 	GenPre(pre_init_per_suite,
 1602: 	       [[1100,100],[800],[900],[1000],[1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1603: 	GenPost(post_init_per_suite,
 1604: 		[[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1605: 		 [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1606: 	[{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
 1607: 
 1608: 
 1609: 	 [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{init_per_group,'_',[]}}}] ++
 1610: 	     GenPre(pre_init_per_group,
 1611: 		    [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],
 1612: 		     [900],[1000],[1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1613: 	     GenPost(post_init_per_group,
 1614: 		     [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1615: 		      [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1616: 		      [1100],[1200]]) ++
 1617: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{init_per_group,'_',[]},ok}}] ++
 1618: 
 1619: 	     [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,test_case}}] ++
 1620: 	     GenPre(pre_init_per_testcase,
 1621: 		    [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1622: 		     [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1623: 		     [1100],[1200]]) ++
 1624: 	     GenPost(post_end_per_testcase,
 1625: 		     lists:reverse(
 1626: 		       [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1627: 			[900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1628: 			[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1629: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
 1630: 
 1631: 	      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{end_per_group,'_',[]}}}] ++
 1632: 	     GenPre(pre_end_per_group,
 1633: 		    lists:reverse(
 1634: 		      [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1635: 		       [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1636: 		       [1100],[1200]])) ++
 1637: 	     GenPost(post_end_per_group,
 1638: 		     lists:reverse(
 1639: 		       [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1640: 			[900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1641: 			[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1642: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{end_per_group,'_',[]},ok}}],
 1643: 
 1644: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,end_per_suite}}] ++
 1645: 	GenPre(pre_end_per_suite,
 1646: 	       lists:reverse(
 1647: 		 [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1648: 		  [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1649: 	GenPost(post_end_per_suite,
 1650: 		lists:reverse(
 1651: 		  [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1652: 		   [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1653: 	[{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
 1654: 	 {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 1655: 	 {?eh,stop_logging,[]}];
 1656:

 1906:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_framework,end_per_suite}},
 1907:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_suite,
 1908: 	       [ct_data_dir_SUITE,'$proplist',[{data_dir_name,"ct_data_dir_SUITE_data"}]]}},
 1909:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_suite,
 1910: 	       [ct_data_dir_SUITE,'$proplist',ok,[{data_dir_name,"ct_data_dir_SUITE_data"}]]}},
 1911:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_framework,end_per_suite,ok}},
 1912:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 1913:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1914:     ];
 1915:

 2045: test_events(callbacks_on_skip) ->
 2046:     %% skip_cth.erl will send a 'cth_error' event if a hook is
 2047:     %% erroneously called. Therefore, all Events are changed to
 2048:     %% {negative,{?eh,cth_error,'_'},Event}
 2049:     %% at the end of this function.
 2050:     Events =
 2051:         [
 2052:          {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 2053:          {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 2054:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,id,[[]]}},

 2056:          {?eh,start_info,{6,6,15}},
 2057: 
 2058:          %% all_hook_callbacks_SUITE is skipped in spec
 2059:          %% Only the on_tc_skip callback shall be called
 2060:          {?eh,tc_user_skip,{all_hook_callbacks_SUITE,all,"Skipped in spec"}},
 2061:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,
 2062:                    [all_hook_callbacks_SUITE,all,
 2063:                     {tc_user_skip,"Skipped in spec"},
 2064:                     []]}},
 2065:          {?eh,test_stats,{0,0,{1,0}}},
 2066: 
 2067:          %% skip_init_SUITE is skipped in its init_per_suite function
 2068:          %% No group- or testcase-functions shall be called.
 2069:          {?eh,tc_start,{skip_init_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
 2070:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_suite,
 2071:                    [skip_init_SUITE,
 2072:                     '$proplist',
 2073:                     []]}},
 2074:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_suite,
 2075:                    [skip_init_SUITE,
 2076:                     '$proplist',
 2077:                     {skip,"Skipped in init_per_suite/1"},
 2078:                     []]}},

 2723:                [all_and_groups_SUITE,

 2838: 
 2839: test_events(ok) ->
 2840:     ok.
 2841: 
 2842: update_config_cth_test_events(TestCaseEvents, Suite) ->
 2843:     MaybeEndPerTestcaseCrashEvents =
 2844:         case Suite of
 2845:             ct_update_config_SUITE ->
 2846:                 TestCaseEvents(test_case_timetrap_end_per_testcase_crash,
 2847:                                {timetrap_timeout,1000}) ++
 2848:                     TestCaseEvents(test_case_badmatch,
 2849:                                    {error, {{badmatch,2}, '_'}}) ++
 2850:                     TestCaseEvents(test_case_spawn_crash, {'EXIT',bam});
 2851:             _ ->
 2852:                 []
 2853:         end,
 2854:     [
 2855:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 2856:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 2857:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
 2858: 
 2859:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,init_per_suite}},
 2860:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,
 2861: 	       [Suite,contains([]),[]]}},
 2862:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_suite,
 2863: 	       [Suite,
 2864: 		'$proplist',
 2865: 		contains(
 2866:                   [init_per_suite,
 2867:                    pre_init_per_suite]),
 2868: 		[]]}},
 2869:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,init_per_suite,ok}},
 2870: 
 2871:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite, {init_per_group,group1,[]}}},
 2872:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_group,
 2873: 	       [Suite,
 2874:                 group1,contains(
 2875: 			 [post_init_per_suite,
 2876: 			  init_per_suite,
 2877: 			  pre_init_per_suite]),
 2878: 		[]]}},
 2879:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_group,
 2880: 	       [Suite,
 2881:                 group1,
 2882: 		contains(
 2883: 		  [post_init_per_suite,
 2884: 		   init_per_suite,
 2885: 		   pre_init_per_suite]),
 2886: 		contains(
 2887: 		  [init_per_group,
 2888: 		   pre_init_per_group,
 2889: 		   post_init_per_suite,
 2890: 		   init_per_suite,
 2891: 		   pre_init_per_suite]),
 2892:                 []]}},
 2893:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,{init_per_group,group1,[]},ok}}] ++
 2894:         TestCaseEvents(test_case, ok) ++
 2895:         TestCaseEvents(test_case_fail,
 2896:                        {error,{test_case_failed,because_i_want_failure}}) ++
 2897:         TestCaseEvents(test_case_timetrap, {timetrap_timeout,1000}) ++
 2898:         MaybeEndPerTestcaseCrashEvents ++
 2899:         [{?eh,tc_start,{Suite, {end_per_group,group1,[]}}},
 2900:          {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_group,
 2901:                    [Suite,
 2902:                     group1,contains(
 2903:                              [post_init_per_group,
 2904:                               init_per_group,
 2905:                               pre_init_per_group,
 2906:                               post_init_per_suite,
 2907:                               init_per_suite,
 2908:                               pre_init_per_suite]),
 2909:                     []]}},
 2910:          {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_group,
 2911:                    [Suite,
 2912:                     group1,
 2913:                     contains(
 2914:                       [pre_end_per_group,
 2915:                        post_init_per_group,
 2916:                        init_per_group,
 2917:                        pre_init_per_group,
 2918:                        post_init_per_suite,
 2919:                        init_per_suite,
 2920:                        pre_init_per_suite]),
 2921:                     ok,[]]}},
 2922:          {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,{end_per_group,group1,[]},ok}},
 2923: 
 2924:          {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,end_per_suite}},
 2925:          {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_suite,
 2926:                    [Suite,contains(
 2927:                                              [post_init_per_suite,
 2928:                                               init_per_suite,
 2929:                                               pre_init_per_suite]),
 2930:                     []]}},
 2931:          {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_suite,
 2932:                    [Suite,contains(
 2933:                                              [pre_end_per_suite,
 2934:                                               post_init_per_suite,
 2935:                                               init_per_suite,
 2936:                                               pre_init_per_suite]),
 2937:                     '_',[]]}},
 2938:          {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,end_per_suite,ok}},
 2939:          {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 2940:          {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[contains(
 2941:                                     [post_end_per_suite,
 2942:                                      pre_end_per_suite,
 2943:                                      post_init_per_suite,
 2944:                                      init_per_suite,
 2945:                                      pre_init_per_suite])]}},
 2946:          {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 2947:         ].
 2948: 
 2949: %% test events help functions
 2950: contains(List) ->
 2951:     fun(Proplist) when is_list(Proplist) ->
 2952: 	    contains(List,Proplist)
 2953:     end.
 2954: 
 2955: contains([{not_in_order,List}|T],Rest) ->
 2956:     contains_parallel(List,Rest),
 2957:     contains(T,Rest);
 2958: contains([{Ele,Pos}|T] = L,[H|T2]) ->
 2959:     case element(Pos,H) of
 2960: 	Ele ->
 2961: 	    contains(T,T2);
 2962: 	_ ->
 2963: 	    contains(L,T2)
 2964:     end;
 2965: contains([Ele|T],[{Ele,_}|T2])->
 2966:     contains(T,T2);
 2967: contains([Ele|T],[Ele|T2])->
 2968:     contains(T,T2);
 2969: contains(List,[_|T]) ->
 2970:     contains(List,T);
 2971: contains([],_) ->
 2972:     match.
 2973: 
 2974: contains_parallel([Key | T], Elems) ->
 2975:     contains([Key],Elems),
 2976:     contains_parallel(T,Elems);
 2977: contains_parallel([],_Elems) ->
 2978:     match.
 2979: 
 2980: not_contains(List) ->
 2981:     fun(Proplist) when is_list(Proplist) ->
 2982: 	    [] = [Ele || {Ele,_} <- Proplist,
 2983: 			 Test <- List,
 2984: 			 Test =:= Ele]
 2985:     end.
